channel.title: Peter Einarsson Nielsen
channel.description: Recent content on Peter Einarsson Nielsen

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Peter (PÃ©tur). I hold a master’s degree in physics and am currently working towards a PhD at the University of Cambridge. I study the fermiology and exotic quantum phases of quantum materials. My research interests are emergent quantum phenomena, unconventional superconductivity, topological magnetism, and energy technologies. I did my undergraduate and master’s course at Durham University where I graduated with a first-class degree. Work I did for my master’s thesis led to new insights in magnetic interactions in cubic-chiral materials.
